title: How can I see my current password
body:
Recently I left the game for a week and I come back and I can't sign in. Well, either A it was stolen B my friend isn't letting me use it.
Also note that I have been using the same password and haven't changed it since he gave it to me after he created it back somewhere 
in season 3 and its rising so big concerns with me because I also bought a 10$ gift card of RP to use and I can't even get in to the client.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we're unable to assist you with accessing someone else's account. Account sharing is against the [**Terms of Use**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) and can lead to a permanent suspension of the account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
